Challenged by their teachers to consider and create, communicate and share, BPMS students brought to life the district's core values of courage, citizenship, inclusiveness, service, and heart through inspiring final projects with benefits beyond their school. We are highlighting their work throughout the summer.
Service is the Core Value at the center of Jace Garrison's project, "Draw, Doodle and Dab," which grew from one virtual art lesson via social media to 50! Jace said, "We hoped it would be an educational and recreational distraction for families during the COVID-19 quarantine. I learned that by donating a little bit of my time I could make a difference!! I also learned the impact that just one family could make...some of the videos had over 200 views. We were reaching people from all over the US!"
#PatriotPride #CoreValues

Great job! #PatriotPride
